summary: The Eiffel Tower is an iconic wrought-iron tower in Paris, France, named after its designer, Gustave Eiffel. Standing at 330 meters tall, it was the world's tallest structure for 41 years. Originally criticized for its design, it is now a famous symbol of France and one of the world's most-visited monuments, attracting millions yearly. It has three levels with restaurants and an observation deck, offering breathtaking views of the city. The top level includes a unique apartment once used by Eiffel himself.
title: Eiffel Tower
